title: Client Black Screen - I tried EVERYTHING I found and STILL won't work
body: Anybody have any ideas for me to get the alpha client to work? I've tried just about every solution I've found, even messed with the registry, but nothing. I'm using Windows Vista Service Pack 2. ANY ideas? My son and I would love to try the alpha League. We're incredibly frustrated that we get the invite and then can't actually play. Thank you so much to whoever posts any ideas. We're desperate :(

replies.body: No sir, unfortunately. I am able to connect just fine with the regular client but when I try to open the "League Client Alpha".. just nothing :/ Are the regular client and Alpha Client separate connection wise?

Black screens in the client are typically caused by incompatible network settings that prevent your connection from hitting the servers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
